experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Developing and maintaining software modules for payroll and HR solutions with a focus on AI integration. Working across the full stack using Angular, C#, and MySQL while collaborating with cross-functional teams using Git and Agile methodologies.
achievements: Integrated AI modules to enhance automation in payroll workflows
Contributed to scalable UI components using Angular
Refactored backend logic in C# improving code maintainability and performance

experiences.title: ReactJS Intern
experiences.description: Contributed to feature enhancements and bug fixes for a LinkedIn clone web application using ReactJS. Participated in the full software development lifecycle including requirement analysis, implementation, testing, and deployment.
achievements: Enhanced UI/UX and added new features improving user engagement by 20%
Fixed critical rendering bugs to improve cross-browser compatibility
Improved state management using React hooks and modular components

education.title: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Graduated with a CGPA of 8.04/10.00. Focused on core computer science subjects including data structures, algorithms, web development, database systems, and software engineering. Completed hands-on projects with version control using Git and GitHub.

education.title: Higher Secondary Education (Science Stream)
education.description: Completed senior secondary education with Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics as major subjects. Developed foundational knowledge in logic, problem-solving, and analytical reasoning through coursework.
